abstract.para: User manual for the Fantasdic dictionary.

sect1.title: Introduction
sect1.para: &app; is a dictionary application. It enables to look up words using dictionary servers.

sect1.title: Getting Started
sect1.para: You can start &app; in the following ways:
Once started, the &app; window is displayed:

sect2.title: Looking up a word
sect2.para:
To look up a word, type it into the entry field and press Enter. It is possible to change the match strategy by using the left combo box. It it possible to change the dictionary used to look up words by using the right combo box.
Dictionaries can be added and changed in the preferences. Available match strategies depend on the dictionary selected.
If some definition for the word is found, it will appear inside the main window area:

textobject.phrase: Shows a definition inside the &app; main window.

sect2.para: Otherwise, an error dialog will appear, with a message explaining the nature of the error.

sect2.title: Saving results
sect2.para: To save the results of a look up, choose Fantasdic Save. Enter a name for the file in the Save dialog, then click Save.

sect2.title: Printing results
sect2.para: To print the results of a look up, choose Fantasdic Print.
Inside the Print dialog you can select the printer to use, the paper format, the number of copies.
To see a preview of what will be printed, click Preview.

sect2.title: Finding text

textobject.phrase: Shows the &app; Find pane inside the main window.

sect2.para: To find text inside the results of a look up, perform the following steps:

listitem.para: Choose Edit Find to display the Find pane.
Type the text you want to find inside the Search entry.
To find the next occurrence of the text, click Next. To find the previous occurrence of the text, click Previous.

sect1.title: Preferences
sect1.para: To change the application preferences, choose EditPreferences .

sect1.title: Dictionaries
sect1.para: To add or change dictionaries used to look up words, choose the "Dictionaries" tab in the preferences window.

sect1.title: About &app;
sect1.para: &app; is written by Mathieu Blondel (mblondel@cvs.gnome.org). To find more information about &app;, please visit the &app; Home Page.
